Title: Consus
Description: This project is aiming to develop an encryption application that enables the user to encrypt and decrypt text (primarily) and files (in the future). The project will be written in VB.NET and called Consus.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is aiming to develop an encryption application that enables the user to encrypt and decrypt text (primarily) and files (in the future). The project will be written in VB.NET and called Consus. The first version of the source is now available to download aswell as the standalone version.

Look here for a preview
http://www.screentoaster.com/watch/stWUlWR01IR19dRlxUWVteUlNS/consus
